Class KWArrayList<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw2.KWArrayList<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<E>

    public class KWArrayList<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<E>
    This class implements some of the methods of the Java ArrayList class.
    Author:
    ozan.geckin, KoffmanWolfgang

      This method to add an element to the index I want.Before this method, I do capacity control.I shift the index after I put the data

      java.util.Iterator<E> iterator()

      boolean remove(E data)
      It searches the data it receives as a parameter, if it finds it, it calls the remove (index) method and returns true if it can remove it.

        public boolean remove(E data)
